document_name: Capacity Development Facility revised project document 2012
Capacity Development Facility revised project document part 2
Capacity Development Facility revised project document 2011

outputs.output_descr:
Capacity Development Framework project is generally aimed at getting the government structures operational and support advisory services to the Government to allow the effective and efficient delivery of services to client beneficiaries and over time, allow service providers (e.g., government, private sector, civil society organizations) to be able to do things on their own. 
Output 1
Capacity of the Office of the President strengthened to develop a strategy for political stability and reform, and policies  as well as effective public communication and outreach enhanced 
Output 2
Capacity of the Prime-Minister Office and selected ministries/state agencies strengthened to develop and implement socio-economic reforms to promote inter-ethnical reconciliation, trust, gender equality and economic recovery 
Output 3
National efforts  supported to improve transparency and accountability for preventing corruption
Output 4: 
Corruption risk reduction plans for the Ministry of Health, Ministry of Education developed and measures to engage in a policy dialogue with Public Advisory Councils (PACs) to combat corrupt practices introduced
